Name: Stamina
Description:
In Life Skills activities, some gathering targets and crafting recipes cost Stamina. In addition to earning tradable items, you will also gain a large amount of Life Skills EXP.
400 Stamina auto-recovers daily at 5:00, subject to the max Stamina limit.
